itunes:title: Episode 060: Valerie Cooper (feat. Patrick Sullivan)
title: Episode 060: Valerie Cooper (feat. Patrick Sullivan)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 60 of CEREBRO, Connor and artist Patrick Sullivan debate policy with mutantkind's ultimate frenemy, Dr. Valerie Cooper! Introduced in the Claremont era as an antagonist, government bureaucrat Val developed over time into the X-Men's most powerful human ally... most of the time.

The CEREBRO character file on Val Cooper begins at 1:38:58.

(Content Advisory: Val's story includes a miscarriage.)



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
